title: Facebook's ‘oversight board’ is proof that it wants to be regulated – by itself | John Naughton
text: The latest attempt by the social media giant to act as a sovereign power is breathtaking in its sheer effrontery

title: Facebook Just Acquired GIPHY
text: This is the social networking giant's fifth-largest acquisition to date.

title: Saudi wealth fund boosts U.S. holdings with stakes in Citi, Boeing, Facebook
text: Saudi Arabia's sovereign wealth fund has bought minority stakes in major American companies including Boeing , Facebook  and Citigroup , a regulatory filing showed, giving it a portfolio of nearly $10 billion in U.S.-listed stocks.

title: Now More Than Ever, Facebook Is a ‘Mark Zuckerberg Production’
text: For years, he was an obsessive C.E.O. in some ways, distant in others.

title: Saudi sovereign fund discloses stakes in Citi, Boeing, Facebook
text: Saudi Arabia's sovereign wealth fund, the Public Investment Fund (PIF), has purchased minority stakes in major U.S. companies including Boeing , Facebook  and Citigroup , according to a U.S.
